about_the_game:
Welcome to Dog Walking Simulator!

Step into the shoes of a dog walker and uncover the secrets hidden beneath the surface of your seemingly mundane profession. Are you ready to forge a bond with your furry companions and unravel the mysteries of the city's underworld? Take the leash and embark on an unforgettable journey in Dog Walking Simulator!

Key Features

Realistic Dog Walking: Strap on your leash and venture into the streets to walk dogs, earn money, and increase your rating. Upgrade your home and means of transportation to take on higher-status dogs for bigger rewards.

Customizable Experience: Experience dog walking as never before, as you will interact with different dog breeds, get a dog and take care of it, and work developing your own business in the dog caring industry. Manage your stamina and money, and life satisfaction as you progress in the business.

Engaging Narrative: Explore a branching storyline filled with colourful characters, including dog owners ranging from lower-class citizens to high-profile figures, each with unique personalities and connections to the main plot.

Interactive Environment: Navigate through detailed locations, from bustling city streets to decrepit back alleys, encountering a diverse cast of NPCs with their reactions to your actions.

Unexpected Stories: Face unpredictable challenges and moral dilemmas as you balance your responsibilities as a dog walker with the dangers lurking in the shadows of the city's underworld.
detailed_description:
Game Progress Updates



• The game has been optimized for better performance on all systems
• We added many cats and dogs the player can interact with and observe in the world
• Implemented user interfaces for many of the game's features, namely the veterinary store, the player's phone, dialogue with NPCs and dog owners, home and pause menus
• Implemented the veterinary store, where the player can adopt dogs as pets and purchase many cosmetics and power-ups
• Implemented a dog-walking job system, for all prospective dog walkers to make a living off of, with varying difficulties and payouts
• Various visual updates such as better post-processing, lighting updates, new and optimized textures for lots of items and structures
• Various gameplay updates and bug fixes


Discord

• We added many cats and dogs the player can interact with and observe in the world
• Implemented user interfaces for many of the game's features, namely the veterinary store, the player's phone, dialogue with NPCs and dog owners, home and pause menus
• Implemented the veterinary store, where the player can adopt dogs as pets and purchase many cosmetics and power-ups
• Implemented a dog-walking job system, for all prospective dog walkers to make a living off of, with varying difficulties and payouts
• Various visual updates such as better post-processing, lighting updates, new and optimized textures for lots of items and structures
• Various gameplay updates and bug fixes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or dedicated GPU with at least 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: At least 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Stable internet connection for initial download and updates

name: Dog Walking Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dog Walking Simulator: Become a professional dog walker! Walk a menagerie of dogs and do your best to keep them happy, healthy, and satisfied. Adopt and take care of your own pets and even open your own dog-related business!
